note.para: The regular .exe installer of &agent; requires the Microsoft .NET Framework version 2.0, 3.0 or 3.5. This package is usually already installed on most hosts. Download the package here.
Version 4.0 of the .NET Framework is NOT supported.
The nosnapin and the .msi version of the installer does not install the graphical MMC snapin of &agentabbrev;, and does not require the .NET Framework.
